# AppKit - Reflex-Mantine Component Library

> Production-ready Mantine UI components for Reflex web applications, focusing on form inputs, user authentication, image generation, and assistant functionality. Built with Python 3.13, Reflex 0.8+, React 18, and Mantine 8.3.3. Features type-safe components, inheritance-based architecture eliminating code duplication, and comprehensive examples.

AppKit is a modular workspace-based project with six specialized component libraries designed to accelerate development of robust web applications. The project emphasizes clean architecture, inheritance-based design patterns, and production-ready examples.

**Key Stack:** Python 3.13 · Reflex (UI Framework) · FastAPI · SQLAlchemy 2.0 · Alembic · Pydantic · Mantine 8.3.3 · React 18 · FastMCP · LangChain

## Component Libraries

- [appkit-mantine README](components/appkit-mantine/README.md): Mantine UI component wrappers - Input, DateInput, NumberInput, PasswordInput, Textarea, NavigationProgress, RichTextEditor with full type safety
- [appkit-commons README](components/appkit-commons/README.md): Shared utilities, configuration, database helpers, registry, and common patterns across all modules
- [appkit-user README](components/appkit-user/README.md): User authentication, OAuth integration (Azure, GitHub), user management, and role-based access control (RBAC)
- [appkit-assistant README](components/appkit-assistant/README.md): AI assistant functionality with multiple LLM integrations (OpenAI, Perplexity, custom processors) and MCP server management
- [appkit-imagecreator README](components/appkit-imagecreator/README.md): Image generation capabilities with state management and processor integration
- [appkit-ui README](components/appkit-ui/README.md): Reusable UI components, dialogs, form inputs, headers, and common UI patterns

## Architecture & Design

- [Mantine Component Architecture](components/appkit-mantine/README.md#project-architecture): Inheritance-based design with MantineComponentBase, MantineInputComponentBase for 40+ common props, MantineProvider integration
- [Base Classes & Inheritance](.github/copilot-instructions.md#critical-integration-patterns): Parent class hierarchies, event handler transformations, prop inheritance patterns

- [State Management Patterns](.github/copilot-instructions.md#code-quality-standards): Type-safe state definitions, event handlers, controlled vs uncontrolled components

## Project Structure

**Workspace Components:**
- `components/appkit-mantine/` - Mantine UI component wrappers with inheritance-based architecture
- `components/appkit-commons/` - Shared configuration, database, utilities, and registry
- `components/appkit-user/` - Authentication, user management, OAuth integration
- `components/appkit-assistant/` - AI assistant with LLM processors and MCP server support
- `components/appkit-imagecreator/` - Image generation with state management
- `components/appkit-ui/` - Reusable UI components and patterns

**Application:**
- `app/` - Demo application showcasing all components with example pages and state management
- `app/components/` - Application-level UI components (navbar, navigation)
- `app/pages/` - Example pages demonstrating each component type
- `app/pages/assitant/` - Assistant integration pages
- `app/pages/examples/` - Comprehensive examples for all input components

**Infrastructure:**
- `alembic/` - Database migrations and version control
- `configuration/` - Environment-specific configuration files (YAML-based)
- `assets/` - CSS, JavaScript, icons, and static files
- `.github/` - GitHub configuration, workflows, instructions, and prompts
